Question
========

Suppose effect coding was applied in a regression to determine whether lesson program A ($Prog_{A}$) and teaching program B ($Prog_{B}$) perform statistically significantly better than curriculum C. The estimated regression equation is: $Y’ = 50+(8*Prog_{A})–(6*Prog_{B})$.

What is the average score of lesson program C? 
Answerlist
----------
* 52
* 50
* 48
* 51

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
